item.title: Hands On Arcitecture
item.description: Hands on Architecture Role Of the Architect Define a blueprint Requirements Clarification Top level functional and non functional requirements (system qualities) True North Engineering Principles for the system High level design (Decomposition of system into components) Quality Attributes Product Velocity (cicd) a/b testing - every feature has a flag Technology Selection Leadership (Steering and asking tough questions at design meetings) Coaching and Mentoring Developers Outside of their normal deliverables Target State vs Current State mvp next bite sized chunks after that Software Architecture vs Design High Level Structure Low Level Implementatiion Details What does Architecture look like?
